Package Model

Class Country

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Country
  • public class Country
extends java.lang.Object
    This class maintains all the data members and methods related to each country.

      • addCountry

        public static boolean addCountry​(java.lang.String newCountry,
                                 java.lang.String inContinent,
                                 Graph gameGraph)
        Add a new country object to gameGraph adjacency list
        Parameters:
        newCountry - Specifies the name of the country to be added
        inContinent - Specifies the name of the continent in which the country is to be added
        gameGraph - It is the object of class Graph
        Returns:
        true(If addCountry method runs successfully) or false(If continent is not found or the country already exists)

      • addNeighbour

        public static boolean addNeighbour​(java.lang.String countryWithNewNeighbour,
                                   java.lang.String neighbour,
                                   Graph gameGraph)
        This adds new neighbour country number in ArrayList of neighbors in country.adjlist.neighbours and also adds the country's number in new neighbor's Arraylist of neighbors
        Parameters:
        countryWithNewNeighbour - Name of the country to which neighbours are to be added
        neighbour - Name of the neighbour to be added
        gameGraph - gameGraph It is the object of class Graph
        Returns:
        true(If addNeighbour runs and neighbour is added successfully) or false(If either country or the neighbour is absent from the map)

      • removeCountry

        public static boolean removeCountry​(java.lang.String NameOfCountryToRemove,
                                    Graph gameGraph)
        This method removes a country from the gameGraph list, and makes the necessary changes to the list
        Parameters:
        NameOfCountryToRemove - Name of a country that is to be removed
        gameGraph - Object of the class Graph
        Returns:
        true(If removeCountry executes successfully) or false(If the country is not present in the map)

      • removeNeighbour

        public static boolean removeNeighbour​(java.lang.String firstCountryName,
                                      java.lang.String secondCountryName,
                                      Graph gameGraph)
        This method removes a neighbour from a country that exists in the gameGraph variable
        Parameters:
        firstCountryName - Name of the first country
        secondCountryName - Name of the second country
        gameGraph - It is the object of class Graph
        Returns:
        true(If the method runs successfully and the neighbour is removed as required) or false(If the country is absent from the map or if the one of the countries is not the neighbour of the other

        Parameters:
        countryName - Name of the country
        numberOfArmies - Number of army units to be added
        gameGraph - It is the object of class Graph
        Returns:
        true(If the method runs successfully and the countries are reinforced) or false(If the country is absent)

        countryName - Name of the country
        numberOfArmies - Number of army units
        gameGraph - It is the object of class Graph
        Returns:
